title: Plate, early 20th century
creditline: Gift of Mary M. Kenway from the estate of Sarah B. Russell
description: Flat marly with four scrolled reserves on rinhg-and-dot patterned pink ground. center reserved and framed by scrolls, with bird of paradise and flowers. Bunches of flowers in reserves. All outlines printed, color areas painted in, in the manner of 'famille rose'.

tombstone.epitaph:
Plate, early 20th century.
early 20th century. earthenware. Gift of Mary M. Kenway from the estate of Sarah B. Russell. 1956-42-82.
